Grilled Corn

grilled
vegetarian
side

Ingredients

Corn

  • corn on the cob (1 per person)
  • oil
  • salt

Basting Butter

  • butter
  • cumin
  • paprika
  • corriander
  • garlic powder
  • alleppo/chipotle pepper

Procedure

prepare the grill

  1. start a chimney of charcoal and when hot, create a hot side and cool side

Basting butter

  1. melt butter and mix spices to create the basting mix

Corn

  1. strip the cobs, coat in oil and sprinkle with salt
  2. place the cobs right on the border of hot/cold so they are on "medium" heat.
  3. every 5 minutes turn the cobs
  4. after 10 minutes, brush with basting butter (and brush again ev ery 5 minutes)
  5. after 15 minutes, place directly over coals and rotate regularly until the desired level of char is reached
